context: Do you have any information on the book, My Sister's Keeper? I heard it was good.

Sure My Sister's Keeper is a 2004 novel written by Jodi Picoult. It tells the story of thirteen-year-old Anna Fitzgerald, who sues her parents for medical emancipation when she discovers she was supposed to donate a kidney to her elder sister Kate, who is gradually dying from acute leukemia.
Do you know of any other books by that author?
